articles.author: Meron Moges-Gerbi
articles.title: Minnesota unveils new state flag after decades of criticism of previous design - CNN
articles.description: Minnesota unveiled a new state flag Tuesday after the original flag drew criticism for its design and depiction of Native Americans.
articles.content:
Minnesota unveiled a new state flag Tuesday after the original flag drew criticism for its design and depiction of Native Americans.
The State Emblems Redesign Commission said it selected a new flag… [+1641 chars]
